mapper.select: select CODE as LANG_CODE ,CODE_NM as LANG_CODE_NM from comtccmmndetailcode where 1=1 and CODE_ID='LANG_CD' and USE_AT='Y'

select A.CODE as CODE ,A.CODE_NM as CODE_NM ,b.ACT_CODE as checkCode from info_lang_code a left join (
SELECT USER_ID , ACT_CODE FROM WJ_ACT_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND USER_ID =#{userId} ) b on a.CODE = b.ACT_CODE where 1=1 AND A.CODE_ID ='WJ_20' and a.LANG_CODE =#{langCode}
